players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Stay cautious of Diana, as she might be working with me."
You: "Bob, I investigated Charlie and found out they are the mafioso. We need to work together to figure out who Diana is working with."
